tasks.task: Cotton farming operations on a 3-acre plot
subtasks: Visiting and assessing the cotton crop growth
Noting the readiness of the first crop and preparing for plucking
Observing the second crop's bud development and praying for sufficient rainfall
Identifying the Lipro cotton variety and mentioning seed availability in the description
Managing agricultural waste around the crop areas
Inspecting and maintaining boundary trees, such as custard apple, for organic yield
Praising the organic approach and encouraging viewers to support rain prayers for the crop
